modShortDescription: Apocalypse Now Overhaul Mod for 7 Days To Die. 144 slot backpack! 24 slot crafting queue! Added New Custom Food/Drinks. Added 4 Generated Maps and more.
modDescription:
Apocalypse Now Overhaul Mod for 7 Days To Die.

## Features

* Progression Tree Overhaul
* 7 new Classes “Engineer, Survivalist, Hunter, Medic, Farmer, Miner and Scavenger”
* 144 slot [backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/)! 24 slot crafting queue!
* Custom UI! Food/Water bars.
* Increased zombie spawn/respawn rate!
* Night time is now Hell. Don’t Blame Me if you died. ;p
* Titanium Nodes added! Can be found in the wasteland.
* Wasteland is now radiated.
* More [crops](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-farming/)! Grow Apple, Cherry, Banana, Coconut and Lemon trees, plus strawberries, cabbage, carrot, cucumber and tomatoes.
* Big list of melee weapons have been added, from Swords, Bats, Pitchforks, Maces, Frying Pan, Cleaver and more
* Added New Custom Food/Drinks
* Added Higher Tier Weapons And Tools
* Added Scrap Tier [Tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/)
* Added 27 New item\_modifiers
* Legendary Tier weapons have been added
* Gun parts are back
* Added 4 Generated [Maps](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-maps/) With ZZTong Prefabs
* Added Stainless Steel, Titanium and Reinforced Titanium Blocks
* Traders are Destructible and open all the time
* Added New Ammo and explosives
* Added few New [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) Bosses Including the behemoth
* The Candy is Craft-able Now
* 8 new workstations, 2 Advanced Forges, 2 Advanced Workbenches
* An Advanced chemistry Station, Advanced Cement Mixer And Upgrade Bench
* Added Research Desk

### Class Information

* Engineer Class Training Grants you: [Bicycle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) Chassis and Handlebars.
* Survivalist Class Training Grants you: Cloth Armor Bundle.
* Hunter Class Training Grants you: Hunting Rifle Bundle.
* Medic Class Training Grants you: 4 First Aid Bandage, 2 First Aid Kit, 2 Painkillers, 2 Herbal [Antibiotics](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/) and 2 Plaster Cast.
* Farmer Class Training Grants you: Food Bundle 01.
* Miner Class Training Grants you: Scrap Armor Bundle.
* Scavenger Class Training Grants you: (150) 7.62mm [Ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/), (150) 9mm Ammo and (150) Shotgun Shell.

## Apocalypse Now Mod Credits

1. A20-GameStage Difficulty Bonus by Bar0th
2. [Bdubs Vehicles Modlet](https://7daystodiemods.com/bdubyahs-vehicles-all-in-one/) by Bdubyah
3. Block Buff AOE by Alter
4. Supply Drops by Chickun/JustDoAsIDo
5. Disable Trader Protection by Khaine
6. [Improved RWG](https://7daystodiemods.com/improved-rwg/) by Magedaddy
7. 12 Slots Toolbelt by Khaine
8. [TFP Hornet](https://7daystodiemods.com/return-of-the-hornet/) by Khaine
9. [TFP Behemoths](https://7daystodiemods.com/return-of-the-behemoth/) by Khaine
10. [Vehicle Damage Patch](https://7daystodiemods.com/vehicle-damage-patch/) by Khaine
11. [Zombie Fall Damage](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-fall-damage/) by Khaine
12. No Zombie Rage by mythix
13. [Ocb Pin Recipes 0.4.1](https://7daystodiemods.com/pin-recipes-mod/) by ocbMaurice
14. Items Quality Rework by KillerBunny/Bar0th
15. [Active Ingredients](https://7daystodiemods.com/active-ingredients/) by Redbeard
16. Scouts Mod by mythix
17. SWU Farming Mod by Zeeeeeeniiiiiii
18. Wandering Horde GameStage patch by mythix
19. Menu Music by Yakov
20. [Advanced Forge](https://7daystodiemods.com/advanced-forge/) and [Advanced Chemistry Station](https://7daystodiemods.com/advanced-chemistry-station/) by Zilox135

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/killerbunny264/7dtd-ApocNowModA20/-/archive/main/7dtd-ApocNowModA20-main.zip)** Apocalypse Now Mod Experimental for **A20**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/killerbunny264/Apocalypse-Now-Mod-For-7-Days-To-die/-/archive/main/Apocalypse-Now-Mod-For-7-Days-To-die-main.zip)** Apocalypse Now Mod for **A19**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/GS3wGQTu6U).
